name: System is a-down
description:
Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move, keys (1-3/ZXC/JKL) to connect or disconnect cables to ports (provided you have spares).

Goal: Listen to your coworkers and help them deliver their messages to each other. Make sure you are using the correct ports! You are a network engineer the backbone of our company!

Kind regards,

CEO

P.S. Vivaldi browser is known to cause issues. We recommend using browsers provided by our company.
